introduction.title: Company Introduction
introduction.description: HDT AI Technology Corporation is a technology startup focused on developing practical artificial intelligence (AI) solutions. We help individuals and businesses accelerate performance – save costs – breakthrough innovation, thereby promoting sustainable development in the digital age.

vision.sectionSubtitle: The values that guide HDT AI's operations
vision.title: Vision
vision.description: To become a pioneer in bringing AI applications deep into work and life in Vietnam and the region.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: Transform artificial intelligence into practical, easy-to-use, easy-to-apply tools for everyone – from small individuals to large enterprises.
